channel.title: [PI][DSPK] Buying from Shop
channel.description: Okay, when I buy from a shop there's a delay before I can buy again. How do I fix this? When I click [Buy (Whatever Amount)] on one item and try to click it again, or but another item, it makes me wait like 1 second. It doesn't say anything, but if I click the buy button it won't do anything.

item.title: [PI][DSPK] Buying from Shop
item.dc:creator: @Pkor159 Pkor159
item.description:
@Pkor159 wrote:

The delay is that people won’t dupe items in some way :3.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI][DSPK] Buying from Shop

item.description:
@DaGamerChild wrote:

Okay, when I buy from a shop there’s a delay before I can buy again. How do I fix this? When I click [Buy (Whatever Amount)] on one item and try to click it again, or but another item, it makes me wait like 1 second. It doesn’t say anything, but if I click the buy button it won’t do anything.
